name: Roasted Garlic Jam
description: Garlic can be subtle and sweet, or it can be a big bully with acrid undertones. Its behavior depends on how it's cooked and in what company. Here, it cozies up with lemon juice, cayenne and parsley, blending fast into a zippy, soft topping for bruschetta, pizza or your favorite grilled meat.
keywords: appetizer, flat-leaf parsley, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil
recipeIngredient: 4 large heads garlic, roasted and peeled (see recipe)

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the garlic with a knife until it forms a paste. Place in a bowl and stir in the olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper and cayenne. Stir in the parsley. Use for bruschetta, pizza or grilled meats.
